entry.title: “If the sky falls, will you catch it with me?”
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,360Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 19

Summary: A crash in Smallville brings more than wreckage.It brings a detective with too many questions, a farm boy with too many secrets,and the slow realization that maybe saving the world isn’t something you do alone.He’s not yet Superman. He’s not yet Batman.Just Clark Kent, just Bruce Wayne—two boys caught between who they are and who they have to become.But the closer Bruce looks, the less Smallville makes sense.And the closer Clark gets, the harder it is to let go.How did a wreckage lead to this?

entry.title: A Lilac Love
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,369Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Sequel to LAVENDER MARRIAGEIt's been three months since Clark was shot with a bullet of lavender kryptonite, impressing him with false memories of his marriage to Bruce Wayne. After a tumultuous balancing act between truth, lies, and certain death, Clark is finally free of the kryptonite's influence, but not its after effects. In the aftermath, Clark confessed his true feelings for Bruce, who eventually let his walls down long enough to give dating a shot.Now in the midst of a brand new(ish) relationship, they aim to keep it business as usual for Batman and Superman. But the League is getting suspicious, and when an old face returns under strange circumstances, their delicate relationship may not be able to weather the storm.

entry.title: putting down roots
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,932Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: "Is Jason alive?" Bruce whispered once, in a voice he rarely used anymore. "Clark? Is he really here? With us?""Yeah." Clark kissed him on the forehead with such tenderness that Bruce wanted to die. "He's fine. His heart is beating strong. I can hear him, B. He's still out on patrol. Tim is eating a cheeseburger with Kon a couple blocks from the old theater on 6th Street. Dick... Dick's laughing at something Damian's telling him. They're all safe."That was the moment. That was the moment Bruce understood why no one would ever understand him as much as Clark did. He also realized no one could ever hold his brokenness and love him as Clark does, in silence and in the dark. (Or, Bruce is having a hard time accepting Dick and Jason's relationship, but not for the reasons one might expect.)

entry.summary:
Author: Jsettpi

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,651Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 34

Summary: In the wake of Lex Luthor's destruction of Metropolis under the smokescreen of the Boravian invasion of Jarhanpur, Clark Kent is thrilled to be sent on the hard-hitting assignment of... covering a Wayne Industries charity gala. But somewhere between the champagne, caviar, and canapés, Bruce Wayne catches his eye. Lois swears it’s a boy crush. Clark swears it’s journalism.

entry.title: Didn't Expect You
entry.summary:
Author: slashyrogue

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,654Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 37

Summary: Clark first meets Bruce at a Wayne Foundation gala and is instantly confused by his own reaction to just a simple touch, a growing possessiveness leading to Bruce's unexpected kindness to take him to his hotel, and hours later they both wake up in bed together with no memory of the encounter. He tells himself it doesn't matter, but an ache consumes him till he flies to the fortress to learn the truth.He's pregnant.Can he keep his pregnancy a secret from Bruce, even as the man consumes his every waking thought?Or will their encounter lead to something neither of them expected?

entry.title: The Contract
entry.summary:
Author: imanaddictiveiguess

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,795Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Eons upon eons have passed since Hadrian "Harry Potter" Black became Death's master. Now expertly wielding powers that preside over both death and magic throughout all of existence and his world now long gone; Hadrian after mourning his friends and long lost world eventually took Death's offer and stayed by their side balancing the cosmos. Now millennia afterwards Death saw it fit to drop him in a new reality where super heroes and villains exist often facing world ending disasters like every other Tuesday. His new duty is that he must help keep this universe from imploding on itself all while on "vacation". No big deal…right?

entry.title: Operation: Chaos on the Runway
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,415Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 91

Summary: In an epic celebration for reaching 4 million subscribers on Cass and Steph's channel, the duo decides to host a livestream guaranteed to break the internet. Their grand plan? Revealing to the world that the mysterious dancer "C" is none other than Cassandra Cain Wayne.But this revelation barely scratches the surface of the night's most explosive moments. With every family member determined to help celebrate, the fun atmosphere quickly escalates into a wild dance competition - because when have the Waynes ever done anything without turning it into a rivalry?Secretly rehearsed choreographies, ruthless judges, and a side bet about their boyfriends' reaction times turn the night into an absolute spectacle. The Batfamily's legendary intensity meets chaotic fun in this unforgettable livestream event where every move could spark new memes and every reveal sends the fandom into meltdown.
